pkgmetadata.longdescription: AMD CodeAnalyst Performance Analyzer for Linux is an open source, front-end graphical user interface to Oprofile. The graphical user interface simplifies the process of collecting performance data and enhances data analysis. Profiles are shown in both tabular and chart form. Users can drill down from system-level processes and modules to source code or instructions.
